function.description: Export browser cookies for a domain to a Netscape cookies.txt file using yt-dlp cookie extraction. Useful for login-gated downloads.
function.name: browser.export_cookies

container.description: Firefox container name (ignored by non-Firefox browsers).

domain.description: Domain to export cookies for (e.g. brighttalk.com).

include_subdomains.description: Include cookies for subdomains of the target domain.

keyring.description: Chromium keyring (primarily for Linux). Usually not needed on macOS.

output.description: Output path for the cookies.txt file.

profile.description: Optional browser profile name or path.
